member.name: T:MainMenu
member.summary: Main Menu script that handles the primary navigation buttons. Uses LobbyUI for centralized navigation instead of direct menu manipulation. Now inherits from BaseMenuController to eliminate code duplication.

member.name: M:MainMenu.OnPlayButtonClick(Unravel.Core.UIPointerEvent)
member.summary: Handles the Play button click - starts the game.

member.name: M:MainMenu.OnSettingsButtonClick(Unravel.Core.UIPointerEvent)
member.summary: Handles the Settings button click - opens settings menu.

member.name: M:MainMenu.OnExitButtonClick(Unravel.Core.UIPointerEvent)
member.summary: Handles the Exit button click - quits the application.

member.name: T:WeaponComponent
member.summary: WeaponComponent that automatically targets and shoots at enemies within range. Handles automatic firing, enemy detection, and projectile spawning.

member.name: M:WeaponComponent.OnCreate
member.summary: Called when the script is created. Initialize component references.

member.name: M:WeaponComponent.OnStart
member.summary: Called when the script starts execution.

member.name: M:WeaponComponent.OnUpdate
member.summary: Called every frame to update weapon logic.

member.name: M:WeaponComponent.CanFire
member.summary: Check if the weapon can fire based on fire rate.
member.returns: True if weapon can fire.

member.name: M:WeaponComponent.FindClosestEnemy
member.summary: Find the closest enemy within range using SphereOverlap.
member.returns: The closest enemy entity, or Entity.Invalid if none found.

member.name: M:WeaponComponent.IsEnemyEntity(Unravel.Core.Entity)
member.summary: Check if an entity is considered an enemy.
member.returns: True if the entity is an enemy.

member.name: M:WeaponComponent.HasLineOfSight(Unravel.Core.Entity)
member.summary: Check if there's a clear line of sight to the target.
member.returns: True if line of sight is clear.

member.name: M:WeaponComponent.CalculateShootDirection(Unravel.Core.Entity)
member.summary: Calculate the shooting direction towards the target.
member.returns: The normalized shooting direction.

member.name: M:WeaponComponent.FireWeapon(Vector3)
member.summary: Fire the weapon in the specified direction.

member.name: M:WeaponComponent.Shoot(Vector3,Vector3,System.Single,System.Int32)
member.summary: Shoot projectiles in the specified direction.
member.param: The number of projectiles to spawn.

member.name: M:WeaponComponent.DrawDebugRanges
member.summary: Draw debug visualization for weapon ranges.

member.name: M:WeaponComponent.GetCurrentTarget
member.summary: Get the current target entity.
member.returns: The current target entity.

member.name: M:WeaponComponent.GetTimeUntilNextShot
member.summary: Get the time until the next shot can be fired.
member.returns: Time in seconds until next shot.

member.name: M:WeaponComponent.IsReadyToFire
member.summary: Check if the weapon is ready to fire.
member.returns: True if ready to fire.

member.name: M:WeaponComponent.SetFireRate(System.Single)
member.summary: Set the fire rate of the weapon.
member.param: New fire rate in shots per second.

member.name: M:WeaponComponent.SetRange(System.Single)
member.summary: Set the weapon range.

member.name: M:WeaponComponent.SetDamage(System.Single)
member.summary: Set the weapon damage.

member.name: T:BasicLevelDirector
member.summary: Level director that provides spawning functionality for a top-down game. Spawns entities around the player at random positions within configurable ranges.

member.name: M:BasicLevelDirector.OnCreate
member.summary: Called when the script is created.

member.name: M:BasicLevelDirector.OnStart
member.summary: Called when the script starts execution.

member.name: M:BasicLevelDirector.OnUpdate
member.summary: Called every frame to handle automatic enemy spawning.

member.name: M:BasicLevelDirector.SpawnAroundPlayer(Unravel.Core.Prefab)
member.summary: Spawn a prefab around the player at a random position on the X,Z plane. The Y position is maintained from the player with an optional offset.
member.returns: The spawned entity, or invalid entity if spawn failed.

member.name: M:BasicLevelDirector.GenerateRandomSpawnPosition(Vector3)
member.summary: Generate a random spawn position around the player on the X,Z plane.
member.returns: A random position around the player.

member.name: M:BasicLevelDirector.SpawnMultipleAroundPlayer(Unravel.Core.Prefab,System.Int32)
member.summary: Spawn multiple entities around the player.
member.returns: Array of spawned entities.

member.name: M:BasicLevelDirector.SetSpawnDistanceRange(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Set the spawn distance range.

member.name: M:BasicLevelDirector.GetSpawnDistanceRange
member.summary: Get the current spawn distance range.
member.returns: A Vector2 with x = minDistance, y = maxDistance.

member.name: M:BasicLevelDirector.IsPositionInSpawnRange(Vector3)
member.summary: Check if a position is within the spawn range of the player.
member.returns: True if the position is within spawn range, false otherwise.

member.name: M:BasicLevelDirector.SetSpawnRate(System.Single)
member.summary: Set the enemy spawn rate.

member.name: M:BasicLevelDirector.SetAutoSpawning(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enable or disable automatic enemy spawning.

member.name: M:BasicLevelDirector.ResetSpawnTimer
member.summary: Reset the spawn timer to force immediate spawn on next update.

member.name: M:BasicLevelDirector.GetTimeUntilNextSpawn
member.summary: Get the time remaining until next spawn.
member.returns: Time in seconds until next spawn, or 0 if ready to spawn.

member.name: M:BasicLevelDirector.FindPlayer
member.summary: Automatically find the player entity.

member.name: M:BasicLevelDirector.GetPlayerPosition
member.summary: Get the player's current position.
member.returns: The player's position, or Vector3.zero if no player is set.

member.name: M:BasicLevelDirector.IsPlayerValid
member.summary: Check if the player is valid and available.
member.returns: True if player is valid, false otherwise.

member.name: M:BasicLevelDirector.SetPlayer(Unravel.Core.Entity)
member.summary: Set the player entity manually.

member.name: T:Enemy
member.summary: Simple enemy AI that moves towards the player's position. Designed for top-down games with basic chase behavior.

member.name: M:Enemy.OnCreate
member.summary: Called when the script is created. Initialize component references.

member.name: M:Enemy.OnStart
member.summary: Called when the script starts execution.

member.name: M:Enemy.OnUpdate
member.summary: Called every frame to handle enemy AI decisions.

member.name: M:Enemy.OnFixedUpdate
member.summary: Called at fixed intervals for physics-based movement.

member.name: M:Enemy.UpdateAI
member.summary: Update enemy AI decisions (called every frame).

member.name: M:Enemy.UpdatePhysicsMovement
member.summary: Update physics-based movement using steering forces (called at fixed intervals).

member.name: M:Enemy.MoveTowardsPlayer(Vector3,System.Single)
member.summary: Move the enemy towards the player using direct transform movement. Includes arrive behavior for smooth stopping.

member.name: M:Enemy.RotateTowardsDirection(Vector3)
member.summary: Rotate the enemy to face a specific direction.

member.name: M:Enemy.FindPlayer
member.summary: Automatically find the player entity.

member.name: M:Enemy.SetTarget(Unravel.Core.Entity)
member.summary: Set the target entity to chase.

member.name: M:Enemy.SetMaxSpeed(System.Single)
member.summary: Set the enemy's maximum movement speed.

member.name: M:Enemy.SetMaxAcceleration(System.Single)
member.summary: Set the enemy's maximum acceleration.

member.name: M:Enemy.GetDistanceToTarget
member.summary: Get the distance to the current target.
member.returns: Distance to target, or -1 if no target is set.

member.name: M:Enemy.IsChasing
member.summary: Check if the enemy is currently chasing the player.
member.returns: True if chasing, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Enemy.IsTargetInRange
member.summary: Check if the target is within chase range.
member.returns: True if target is in range, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Enemy.StopChasing
member.summary: Stop chasing and remain stationary.

member.name: M:Enemy.ResumeChasing
member.summary: Resume chasing the target.

member.name: T:PlayerController
member.summary: PlayerController component that implements basic rigidbody movement for a top-down game. Handles player input, movement, and physics interactions. Requires a PhysicsComponent with a Capsule collider attached to the same entity.

member.name: M:PlayerController.OnCreate
member.summary: Called when the script is created. Initialize component references.

member.name: M:PlayerController.OnStart
member.summary: Called when the script starts execution.

member.name: M:PlayerController.OnUpdate
member.summary: Called every frame to handle input and movement.

member.name: M:PlayerController.HandleInput
member.summary: Handle player input for movement.

member.name: M:PlayerController.HandlePhysicsMovement
member.summary: Handle movement using physics forces with steering behavior (recommended for realistic physics).

member.name: M:PlayerController.HandleDirectMovement
member.summary: Handle movement by directly modifying transform (alternative method).

member.name: M:PlayerController.GetInputDirection
member.summary: Get the current movement input direction.
member.returns: The normalized input direction vector.

member.name: M:PlayerController.GetVelocity
member.summary: Get the current movement velocity.
member.returns: The current velocity vector.

member.name: M:PlayerController.IsMoving
member.summary: Check if the player is currently moving.
member.returns: True if the player is moving, false otherwise.

member.name: M:PlayerController.AddExternalForce(Vector3,Unravel.Core.ForceMode)
member.summary: Add an external force to the player (useful for knockback, wind, etc.).

member.name: M:PlayerController.OnCollisionEnter(Unravel.Core.Collision)
member.summary: Called when this entity begins a collision with another entity. Override this method to handle collision events.

member.name: M:PlayerController.OnSensorEnter(Unravel.Core.Entity)
member.summary: Called when another entity enters a sensor attached to this entity. Useful for trigger zones, item pickup areas, etc.
member.param: The entity that entered the sensor.

member.name: T:TopDownCameraController
member.summary: TopDownCameraController component that implements smooth camera following for a top-down game. Handles camera positioning, smooth following, and optional boundaries. Requires a CameraComponent attached to the same entity.

member.name: M:TopDownCameraController.OnCreate
member.summary: Called when the script is created. Initialize component references.

member.name: M:TopDownCameraController.OnStart
member.summary: Called when the script starts execution.

member.name: M:TopDownCameraController.OnUpdate
member.summary: Called every frame to update camera position (when not using physics movement).

member.name: M:TopDownCameraController.OnFixedUpdate
member.summary: Called at fixed intervals for physics-based camera movement.

member.name: M:TopDownCameraController.UpdateCameraFollow
member.summary: Update camera following logic.

member.name: M:TopDownCameraController.UpdateCameraFollowPhysics
member.summary: Update camera following logic for physics-based movement (uses Time.fixedDeltaTime).

member.name: M:TopDownCameraController.CalculateTargetPosition
member.summary: Calculate the target position based on the player's position and offset.
member.returns: The calculated target position.

member.name: M:TopDownCameraController.ApplyLookAhead
member.summary: Apply look-ahead offset based on player movement.

member.name: M:TopDownCameraController.ApplyBoundaries(Vector3)
member.summary: Apply boundary constraints to the target position.
member.returns: The constrained position.

member.name: M:TopDownCameraController.FindPlayerTarget
member.summary: Automatically find the player entity to follow.

member.name: M:TopDownCameraController.SetTarget(Unravel.Core.Entity)
member.summary: Set the target entity to follow.

member.name: M:TopDownCameraController.SnapToTarget
member.summary: Instantly snap the camera to the target position (no smooth movement).

member.name: T:BaseMenu
member.summary: Base class for all menu controllers that eliminates code duplication. Handles common UI setup, button event registration, and audio callbacks. Child classes only need to implement their specific button actions.

member.name: M:BaseMenu.CacheUIElements
member.summary: Cache UI elements. Override in child classes to cache specific elements.

member.name: M:BaseMenu.CountValidElements
member.summary: Count valid cached elements for logging. Override in child classes.

member.name: M:BaseMenu.SetupInitialUI
member.summary: Set up initial UI state. Override in child classes for specific setup.

member.name: M:BaseMenu.RegisterEventHandlers
member.summary: Register event handlers. Override in child classes to register specific buttons.

member.name: M:BaseMenu.GetTitleElementId
member.summary: Get the ID of the title element for this menu. Override in child classes.

member.name: M:BaseMenu.RegisterButtonEvents(Unravel.Core.UIElement,System.String,System.Action{Unravel.Core.UIPointerEvent},System.Action{Unravel.Core.UIPointerEvent},System.Action{Unravel.Core.UIPointerEvent},System.Action{Unravel.Core.UIPointerEvent},System.Action{Unravel.Core.UIPointerEvent})
member.summary: Register all standard button events for a button element.
member.param: The button element to register events for

member.name: M:BaseMenu.OnButtonDown(Unravel.Core.UIElement,Unravel.Core.UIPointerEvent,System.String)
member.summary: Standard button down handler with audio feedback.

member.name: M:BaseMenu.OnButtonHover(Unravel.Core.UIElement,Unravel.Core.UIPointerEvent,System.String)
member.summary: Standard button hover handler with audio feedback.

member.name: M:BaseMenu.OnButtonLeave(Unravel.Core.UIElement,Unravel.Core.UIPointerEvent,System.String)
member.summary: Standard button leave handler.

member.name: M:BaseMenu.OnButtonRelease(Unravel.Core.UIElement,Unravel.Core.UIPointerEvent,System.String)
member.summary: Standard button release handler.

member.name: M:BaseMenu.PlayButtonClickSound(Unravel.Core.UIElement,Unravel.Core.UIPointerEvent)
member.summary: Plays a button click sound effect. Common callback used by all button click handlers.
member.param: The button element that was clicked
The pointer event containing click information

member.name: M:BaseMenu.PlayButtonHoverSound(Unravel.Core.UIElement,Unravel.Core.UIPointerEvent)
member.summary: Plays a button hover sound effect. Common callback used by all button hover handlers.
member.param: The button element that was hovered
The pointer event containing hover information

member.name: T:AudioPaths
member.summary: Audio file path constants to avoid duplication and make changes easier.

member.name: T:GameMenu
member.summary: Game Menu script that handles in-game navigation buttons. Uses GameUI for centralized navigation instead of direct menu manipulation. Now inherits from BaseMenuController to eliminate code duplication.

member.name: M:GameMenu.OnResumeButtonClick(Unravel.Core.UIPointerEvent)
member.summary: Handles the Resume button click - resumes the game via GameUI.

member.name: M:GameMenu.OnSettingsButtonClick(Unravel.Core.UIPointerEvent)
member.summary: Handles the Settings button click - opens settings menu via GameUI.

member.name: M:GameMenu.OnQuitButtonClick(Unravel.Core.UIPointerEvent)
member.summary: Handles the Quit button click - returns to main menu via GameUI.

member.name: T:GameUI
member.summary: Game UI controller that handles in-game UI and menu functionality. Manages ESC key input, game menu, and in-game UI elements. Focused specifically on gameplay scene functionality.

member.name: M:GameUI.OnCreate
member.summary: OnCreate is called when the script is first loaded, or when an object it is attached to is instantiated It only gets called once on each script, and only after other objects are initialised. This means that it is safe to create references to other game objects and components in OnCreate.

member.name: M:GameUI.OnStart
member.summary: Start is called once, before any Update methods and after OnCreate. It works in much the same way as OnCreate, with a few key differences. Unlike OnCreate, Start will not be called if the script is disabled.

member.name: M:GameUI.FindMenuReferences
member.summary: Automatically find menu entity references if not manually assigned.

member.name: M:GameUI.ValidateReferences
member.summary: Validate that required references are set.

member.name: M:GameUI.ToggleGameMenu
member.summary: Toggle the game menu on/off and handle pause state.

member.name: M:GameUI.OpenGameMenu
member.summary: Open the game menu and pause the game.

member.name: M:GameUI.CloseGameMenu
member.summary: Close the game menu and resume the game.

member.name: M:GameUI.GoToMainMenu
member.summary: Navigate to the main menu (used by quit buttons).

member.name: M:GameUI.ResumeGame
member.summary: Resume the game (used by resume button).

member.name: M:GameUI.OpenSettings
member.summary: Open settings menu from game menu.

member.name: M:GameUI.CloseSettings
member.summary: Close settings and return to game menu.

member.name: M:GameUI.QuitApplication
member.summary: Quit the application (used by exit buttons).

member.name: M:GameUI.ShowMenu(Unravel.Core.Entity,Unravel.Core.Entity)
member.summary: Show a specific menu and hide others (internal helper method).

member.name: M:GameUI.FindInScene
member.summary: Static helper method to find the GameUI controller in the current scene. Can be used by menus to find the game controller.

member.name: T:LobbyUI
member.summary: Lobby UI controller that handles main menu navigation and scene transitions. Manages the main menu, settings menu, and transitions to the game scene.

member.name: M:LobbyUI.OnCreate
member.summary: OnCreate is called when the script is first loaded, or when an object it is attached to is instantiated It only gets called once on each script, and only after other objects are initialised. This means that it is safe to create references to other game objects and components in OnCreate.

member.name: M:LobbyUI.OnStart
member.summary: Start is called once, before any Update methods and after OnCreate. It works in much the same way as OnCreate, with a few key differences. Unlike OnCreate, Start will not be called if the script is disabled.

member.name: M:LobbyUI.FindMenuReferences
member.summary: Automatically find menu entity references if not manually assigned.

member.name: M:LobbyUI.ValidateReferences
member.summary: Validate that required references are set.

member.name: M:LobbyUI.StartGame
member.summary: Start the game (used by play button).

member.name: M:LobbyUI.OpenSettings
member.summary: Open settings menu from main menu.

member.name: M:LobbyUI.CloseSettings
member.summary: Close settings and return to main menu.

member.name: M:LobbyUI.QuitApplication
member.summary: Quit the application (used by exit button).

member.name: M:LobbyUI.ShowMenu(Unravel.Core.Entity,Unravel.Core.Entity)
member.summary: Show a specific menu and hide others (internal helper method).

member.name: M:LobbyUI.FindInScene
member.summary: Static helper method to find the LobbyUI controller in the current scene. Can be used by menus to find the lobby controller.

member.name: M:SettingsMenu.SetPreviousMenu(Unravel.Core.Entity)
member.summary: Set the previous menu for proper back navigation. Called by GameUI when opening settings.

member.name: M:SettingsMenu.SetGraphicsPresets(SettingsMenu.GraphicsPreset[])
member.summary: Set custom graphics presets that will replace the HTML defaults. Call this method before the menu is displayed to populate the dropdown dynamically.
member.param: Array of graphics presets to display

member.name: M:SettingsMenu.GetGraphicsPresets
member.summary: Get the current graphics presets (either custom or default HTML ones).
member.returns: Array of current graphics presets

member.name: M:SettingsMenu.GetDefaultGraphicsPresets
member.summary: Get the default graphics presets that match the HTML options.
member.returns: Array of default graphics presets

member.name: M:SettingsMenu.OnVolumeSliderInput(Unravel.Core.UISliderEvent)
member.summary: Handles the volume slider input event (real-time updates while dragging).

member.name: M:SettingsMenu.OnVolumeSliderChange(Unravel.Core.UISliderEvent)
member.summary: Handles the volume slider change event (final value when released).
member.param: Input event containing final slider value

member.name: M:SettingsMenu.OnGraphicsQualityChange(Unravel.Core.UIChangeEvent)
member.summary: Handles the graphics quality dropdown change event.

member.name: M:SettingsMenu.OnBackButtonClick(Unravel.Core.UIPointerEvent)
member.summary: Handles the Back button click - returns to previous menu.

member.name: M:SettingsMenu.OnApplyButtonClick(Unravel.Core.UIPointerEvent)
member.summary: Handles the Apply button click - applies all settings.

member.name: M:SettingsMenu.PopulateGraphicsDropdown
member.summary: Populates the graphics quality dropdown with custom presets, replacing HTML defaults.

member.name: M:SettingsMenu.UpdateVolumeLabel
member.summary: Updates the volume label to show current volume percentage.

member.name: M:SettingsMenu.UpdateGraphicsQualityLabel
member.summary: Updates the graphics quality label to show current selection.

member.name: M:SettingsMenu.GetGraphicsQualityDisplayName(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the display name for a graphics quality value, checking both custom presets and defaults.
member.param: The graphics quality value to get display name for
member.returns: Display name for the quality value

member.name: M:SettingsMenu.ApplyVolumeSettings
member.summary: Applies the current volume setting to the audio system.

member.name: M:SettingsMenu.ApplyGraphicsQualitySettings
member.summary: Applies the current graphics quality setting to the graphics system.

member.name: M:SettingsMenu.ApplyAllSettings
member.summary: Applies all current settings to the game systems.
